00024 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_ErrorCheck_Date extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_AbstractErrorCheck {
00025 
00034         public function check(&$check,$name,&$gp) {
00035                 $checkFailed = "";
00036 
00037                 # find out separator
00038                 $pattern = $check['params']['pattern'];
00039                 eregi('^[d|m|y]*(.)[d|m|y]*', $pattern, $res);
00040                 $sep = $res[1];
00041 
00042                 # normalisation of format
00043                 $pattern = $this->normalizeDatePattern($pattern,$sep);
00044 
00045                 # find out correct positioins of "d","m","y"
00046                 $pos1 = strpos($pattern, 'd');
00047                 $pos2 = strpos($pattern, 'm');
00048                 $pos3 = strpos($pattern, 'y');
00049                 $dateCheck = explode($sep, $gp[$name]);
00050                 if (sizeof($dateCheck) != 3) {
00051                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00052                 } elseif (intval($dateCheck[0]) == 0 || intval($dateCheck[1]) == 0 || intval($dateCheck[2]) == 0) {
00053                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00054                 } elseif (!checkdate($dateCheck[$pos2], $dateCheck[$pos1], $dateCheck[$pos3])) {
00055                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00056                 } elseif (strlen($dateCheck[$pos3]) != 4) {
00057                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00058                 }
00059                 return $checkFailed;
00060         }
00061 
00069         protected function normalizeDatePattern($pattern,$sep) {
00070                 $pattern = strtoupper($pattern);
00071                 $pattern = str_replace($sep, '', $pattern);
00072                 $pattern = str_replace('DD', 'd', $pattern);
00073                 $pattern = str_replace('D', 'd', $pattern);
00074                 $pattern = str_replace('MM', 'm', $pattern);
00075                 $pattern = str_replace('M', 'm', $pattern);
00076                 $pattern = str_replace('YYYY', 'y', $pattern);
00077                 $pattern = str_replace('YY', 'y', $pattern);
00078                 return $pattern;
00079         }
00080 }
